statements: SELECT * FROM peak_season_data;
SELECT season_name, trend FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM peak_season_data WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_gender, season_name FROM peak_season_data ORDER BY customer_gender DESC;
SELECT season_name, customer_age FROM peak_season_data WHERE trend = 'High' ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_id = 5 ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_gender ASC, season_name
SELECT season_name, customer_age FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT season_name, trend FROM peak_season_data WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_gender = 'M' ORDER BY season_name
SELECT season_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM peak_season_data GROUP BY season_name HAVING total_customers > 3 ORDER BY total_customers DESC
SELECT season_name, customer_gender FROM peak_season_data WHERE customer_age < 25 AND customer_gender = 'F' ORDER BY season_name, customer_age ASC
SELECT * FROM peak_season_data;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT season_id, start_date, end_date, season_name FROM peak_season_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_name = 'Summer'
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM peak_season_data ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM peak_seasons;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM peak_seasons ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_rating > 3;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'M';

SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM peak_seasons WHERE season_id = 1;

SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_rating < 3;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;

SELECT customer_id, peak_season FROM peak_season_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, peak_season, age FROM peak_season_data WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM peak_season_data;
SELECT customer_id, peak_season FROM peak_season_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM trends_data WHERE trend_duration > 5 ORDER BY trend_duration DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
